notes: Test update for development - This is a sample update to test the updater functionality in development mode.

windows-x86_64.__comment: PLACEHOLDER SIGNATURE - This is a test signature for demonstration purposes only. See UPDATER_DEV_GUIDE.md for details on generating signing keys.
